  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CalendarGenericConversion.CALENDAR
    The set of available calendars that have in common that a given date is represented with a year, a month, and a day.

Package jparsec.time.calendar Description

Provides the necessary tools for calendar conversions.

This package provides a direct way to transform dates between different calendars. It is based on Calendrical Calculations, The Millenium Edition (2nd edition, 2002), by N. Dershowitz and E. M. Reingold.
